attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this day of increased congestion on our roads , the need to move heavy transport onto our village roads cannot be taken. This petition aims to highlight the fact that the village of chipping warden is under threat from heavy goods vehicles that travel through this quiet area of oxfordshire. This route on the A361 has become a short cut from the M1 to the M40. A bypass is sorely needed . please sign up
